article_title: Gil Smart: What’s causing the rise in panhandling?
article_text:
Gil Smart is a Lancaster Newspapers investigative reporter and columnist. He also blogs about politics at Smart Remarks. He can be reached at gsmart@lnpnews.com or (717) 291-8817. You can also follow @GilSmart on Twitter.

Suggestions, corrections, clarifications, added information welcome

article_metadata.news_keywords: , smart remarks, gil smart, panhandling in lancaster, panhandling
article_metadata.author: GIL SMART | Staff Writer

og.description: For me, a key question remains: Why is this happening? If panhandling has increased, as many believe, what’s going on? What’s causing this?
